name: Necrorun
description:
Death has been challenged by knights to a duel, and if they win, Death will reward them immortality.

"Dark but funny at the same time, with an ominous and thrilling soundtrack you can play this game for hours or for a few minutes if that's all you have time for. I'll warn you though, Necrorun is addictive." Newswatch TV

"Dark, addictive, eerily beautiful endless runner with great permanent upgrades." ArcadeLife

[Game Features]

► Play as Death on its horse, reaping everything in your path.
► Attack in any direction just by touching the screen. You are in FULL control of your death weapon.
► Joust duel with knights. You have never looked so noble playing with your iPhone.
► Beautiful and idyllic day/night cycles.
► Complete Trials to get higher scores, and get Medals for executing challenges.
► Great soundtrack.
► Destroy all obstacles and living creatures without missing any to increase your Combo Multiplier and score even higher.
► Fun to be played over and over, whether you have a lot of time to spend or just a few minutes.
